definitions.definition: A diminutive of the female given name Isabel , Isobel , Isabelle , Isabella , Elizabeth , Isidora , Isra , Izebel , Ismara and Isobelle .
A diminutive of the male given name Israel , Isaac , Isambard , Isidore , Ismail , Chreistus, Chreistos, Isaiah , Isiah , Izzet , Isarn , Ismail and Isam .
